bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

sense.def: Pathological Condition of extreme pain in the heart and abdomen that comes and goes with changing locations and does not heal. Wai tai mi yao 外台秘要 7: E zhu xin tong fang san shou 惡疰 心痛方三首 , “Three recipes of malign attachment-illness and heartache”: 又療 心腹痛不可忍，似疰病者，或暴得惡疰攪刺欲死，桃仁大黃湯方 , “Also, to heal unbearable pain in heart and abdomen resembling that of attachment-illness diseases, where in some cases one is suddenly afflicted with malign attach ment-illness and a feeling of severe piercing that makes people wish to die, the recipe for a decoction with tao ren and da huang [is advisable]”.
